ygData.subject: Re: Opal Darkbriar and Opal Darkbriar?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... When I saw this message I went through every building i could find not only West FP, but North as well, clicking on every piece of furniture :) Well, no
ygData.messageBody:
> There is a third place Opal Darkbriar spawns which
> is in
> the Slums of West Freeport on the second floor of
> one of
> the buildings. She is usually under a minor
> Illusion
> spell and looks like a locked chest (i think). In
> this
> form, Hails do nothing, and I have no clue how to
> get
> her to drop the illusion. Anyone else see this?


When I saw this message I went through every building
i could find not only West FP, but North as well,
clicking on every piece of furniture :)

Well, no luck. Does anyone have any idea which
building it is she spawns in, and whether she is
always there, as her other 2 counterparts are in their
spot?

The DE (in the underground)and HE (in the Arcane
Science Building) versions are both Guildmasters and
dont seem to leave their spots. But this 3rd one is
hidden in the slums of a town under an illusion. There
must be a reason why, and i want to know what it is.
Besides, a traitor to any good aligned faction is
someone i want to meet. :)

Any help would be appreciated


Bathory D'Allatu
Minions of Darkness
Cazic-Thule
